name: Bananarama
description:
Dies ist ein Projekt welche im Rahmen der Projektarbeit der Games Academy innerhalb von 8 Wochen erstellt wurde.

Bananarama is played as a turn-based strategie Hotseat-Mode. Fill your 30 seconds as you wish. Manage, shoot or build, it’s your choice… Both Pirat Crews are fighting over the legendary island of Bananarama. In ordert to protect their ships both player place Tiki statues on their side oft he field which use magic power to protect their ships. The island with all the treasures on it ultimately belongs to the Captain who first sent the ship of the enemy to the seabed. Aye!

2 Player Game
